channel.title: RuneScape Private Server Coder
channel.description: Hey - I have a server, and I just kinda need a coder. I don't need a big job, all I want is someone to make a teampk, like there is in AllStar Scape. I need it as a place where you start, and I want shops, and ::pickup enabled. In return you will get Owner on my server. :D Thanks!

item.title: RuneScape Private Server Coder
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:13, topic:257191”][quote author=-N- link=topic=339581.msg2632941#msg2632941 date=1232311217]

‘editing’ is editing or codeing
[/quote]No, editing is changing something really simple, like a variable amount. Coding, or programming, is creating things from scratch.

And what he wants is to add a team pk area, which in reality is just changing a safezone into a dangerzone. Haha.

after what he wants already he will want to add more edit stuff…[/quote]

Yes, mate, which is called editing.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Private Server Coder
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

There are various (locked -.-) tutorials on how to do things like this.

As for the people who say this is simple, would you find it simple if you didn’t know how to do it?

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Private Server Coder
item.dc:creator: @lolwut69 lolwut69
item.description:
@lolwut69 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:5, topic:257191”]1. its not ur server if you cant even edit something really easy.
2. go read some tuts on how to do the very basic stuff to make it how you like.
3. why get a coder, most people know how to code, what makes u different?? lazyness.
4. add shops in shop.cfg and add ur items what u want in the shop.
5. if oyou want pickup enabled then make it pickup 0, 1, 2 or 3.[/quote]Most people here don’t know how to “code”, just how to edit.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Private Server Coder
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:

  1. its not ur server if you cant even edit something really easy.
  2. go read some tuts on how to do the very basic stuff to make it how you like.
  3. why get a coder, most people know how to code, what makes u different?? lazyness.
  4. add shops in shop.cfg and add ur items what u want in the shop.
  5. if oyou want pickup enabled then make it pickup 0, 1, 2 or 3.

item.title: RuneScape Private Server Coder
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

Hey buddy it’s not your server if you get a source, and then get someone to edit it as you please. We all had to learn how to edit ours, some better than others. Take the time to do it yourself.

Read full topic
